jobs.description: Worked as a full-stack developer on the Commercial Growth team. Developed back-end functionality in Node.js, Express, and .NET. Created front-end features in React.js, Angular.js, Handlebars.js, and more.
projects: Supported the business-facing website and created new features to help drive engagement and increase signups and conversions.
Created APIs using REST and SOAP in order to sync data between components in a microservice architecture.
Developed several Lambda functions in AWS to carry out lightweight, repeatable business functions.
Worked on the Trustpilot careers website, converting existing UI elements to reusable components in React.js.
Contributed to a fast-moving agile development team, deploying new functionality on a daily basis.

jobs.description: Worked as a full-stack developer in the Institutional Clients Group. Spent my first year with the Finance Desk Technology team and spent my second year with the Global Securitized Markets Technology team
projects: Served as a crucial member in the build-out of MIS, a bid and order tracking module for traders. Developed both front-end and server-side functionality for this module.
Supported the .NET-based Management Reporting module, which provides critical risk and reporting data to traders daily.
Developed robust stateful response messaging for the Margin Operations team using a REST web service and Tibco EMS
Refactored internal code structure for Java modules to allow for single-click deployment. Implemented a new build procedure using Maven.
Managed the reporting and recon build-out for Volcker regulations.
Supported a user base of over 100 traders and salespeople worldwide, spanning multiple desks and asset classes.

jobs.description: Assisted in a wide variety of information technology operations including remote server management, scripting, SharePoint development, managed backup services, audits, and hardware builds.
